typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Recipient address can not be empty"

transferFrom

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Recipient address can not be empty"

arguments.value: Recipient address can not be empty

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Recipient address can not be empty"

nodes.name: transfer
transferFrom
balanceOf
approve
allowance
increaseApproval
decreaseApproval

params._owner: The address of the account owning tokens
params._spender: The address of the account able to transfer the tokens

allowance(address,address).return: Amount of remaining tokens allowed to be spent

params._spender: The address of the account able to transfer the tokens
params._value: The amount of tokens to be approved for transfer

approve(address,uint256).return: Whether the approval was successful or not

params._owner: The address from which the balance will be retrieved

decreaseApproval(address,uint256).details: Decrease the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.     * approve should be called when allowed[_spender] == 0. To decrement allowed value, it is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until the first transaction is mined) From MonolithDAO Token.sol

params._spender: The address which will spend the funds.
params._subtractedValue: The amount of tokens to decrease the allowance by.

increaseApproval(address,uint256).details: Increases the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender. approve should be called when allowed[_spender] == 0. To increment allowed value, it is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until the first transaction is mined) From MonolithDAO Token.sol

params._addedValue: The amount of tokens to increase the allowance by.
params._spender: The address which will spend the funds.

params._value: The amount of token to be transferred

transfer(address,uint256).return: Whether the transfer was successful or not

params._value: The amount of token to be transferred

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).return: Whether the transfer was successful or not

approve(address,uint256).notice: Used by `msg.sender` to approve `_spender` to spend `_value` tokens

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the balance of a token holder

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: sends `_value` tokens to `_to` from `_from` with the condition it is approved by `_from`
